title.en: The Fallen Saint Dances in Vortex of War

altTitles.ja: 闇堕ち聖女は戦禍で舞う

altTitles.ja-ro: Yami Ochi Seijou wa Senka de Mau

description.en:
Alicia has been fighting against the demon king's army and protecting the kingdom as a saint.
One day, she is falsely accused of having an affair with her fiancé, the prince, and is publicly executed.
Abused by the people of the kingdom and despairing of the malice of the people, Alicia makes a final wish.


"I'll kill you all"
"And destroy this country"
She wishes for the death of everyone.

Alicia was supposed to have died in this way, but when she realized it, she was brought back to life by the demon king.
"Haha, now I can kill them all."

The curtain rises on the vengeance of the saintly woman who has been revived from execution...!

Web Novel Raw Link - https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1179he/

Yankee High School Girl Kuzuhana-chan

altTitles.pt-br: Garota Delinquente Do Ensino Médio Kuzuhana-chan

description.en: At the beginning of the academic year, Saotome Hodaka enrolls into Moteshiro Prefectural High School, a former all-girls school that had recently integrated, but discovers it has a male to female ratio of 1:359! While most might think of this as a paradise, the majority of the students are delinquents and Saotome immediately finds himself being extorted by some of the more aggressive girls. However, he is inadvertently saved by Hanako Kuzuryu, a beautiful delinquent who just wants to be left alone. Is this the start of a new friendship? And how will Saotome's life unfold in a school full of troublesome women?
description.fr: Au début de l'année scolaire, Saotome Hodaka intègre le lycée préfectoral de Moteshiro, ancien établissement réservé aux filles et récemment devenu mixte. Il découvre rapidement que le ratio garçons/filles est de 1:359! Bien que cela puisse sembler être un paradis pour certains, la majorité des élèves sont des délinquantes, et Saotome se retrouve aussitôt extorqué par certaines des filles les plus agressives. Par chance, il est sauvé malgré lui par Hanako Kuzuryu, une belle délinquante qui aspire seulement à être laissée en paix. Est-ce le début d'une nouvelle amitié ? Comment la vie de Saotome évoluera-t-elle dans une école pleine de filles turbulentes ?
description.ja: 男女比率1対359!! 359人の女子高生にいじられまくり!! つらたんハーレム学園ラブコメ!! コワかわ最強ヒロイン爆誕!! 四方八方ギャルだらけな県立茂手城高校に入学した黒一点・早乙女穂高は、ヤンキーJK・九頭竜華子にピンチを救われて…!?
description.pt-br: Uma proporção de homem para mulher de 1:359?! Saotome-kun é admitido em uma escola cheia de gyarus e conhece uma garota delinqüente chamada Hanako Kuzuryu.

description.en:
A slapstick comedy that involves a town and its neighbors where “pet dogs” have become “humans”!
Feelings that couldn’t be conveyed as a dog can now be understood directly…!?
description.fr: Un jour, les chiens de cette ville sont soudainement devenus humains. L'histoire suit la vie de Saki et de son chien Ponta.
description.ru: В один прекрасный день домашние собаки в этом городе вдруг превращаются в людей. История рассказывает о жизни хозяйки Саки и ее собаки Понты.
description.uk: Одного разу всі собаки, які жили в цьому місті раптово перетворилися на людей. Історія розповідає про життя Сакі, власниці, та Понти, її пса.

description.es-la: Una serialización del webcomic sobre una maid, Meika, quien no puede reprimir por completo sus sentimientos por su amo, Kouta.

description.en:
Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.

altTitles.ja: ギルティサークル

description.en: April! Sawaya Doji's college life at his dream school of Seio University starts with an encounter with the beautiful Kaede Hoshimi during the club recruiting fair. Sawaya believes that if he goes to Tokyo... if he joins a university... if he joins a club, he can get a girlfriend! It's a great way to meet new people, but what kind of club has he gotten himself into?
description.ja: ４月！憧れの青応大学へと入学した大学１年生・沢屋童二は、サークル勧誘期に美少女・星見楓と出会う。「東京に行けば…大学に入れば…サークルに入れば、彼女ができる！」と信じる沢屋は星見楓とともに派手目なサークルの新歓コンパへと参加するが……。沢屋が足を踏み入れたサークルの罪深き実態、秘密とは何か！？
description.pt-br: Abril! A vida universitária de Sawaya Doji em sua escola de sonho da Universidade de Seio começa com um encontro com a bela Kaede Hoshimi durante a feira de recrutamento do clube. Sawaya acredita que se ele for para Tóquio... se ele entrar em uma universidade... se ele entrar em um clube, ele pode conseguir uma namorada! É uma ótima maneira de conhecer novas pessoas, mas em que tipo de clube ele se meteu?

altTitles.ja: あかね噺

altTitles.ja-ro: Akane-banashi

altTitles.en: Tales Of Akane
Akane Story

description.en:
Rakugo--the ultimate form of storytelling, where everything in a story is expressed with just your body and words. 
Shinta and his daughter Akane have been seduced by this wonderful form of classical Japanese entertainment. 
Having observed her father strive to pass the shin'uchi rakugo test, Akane takes her own steps into this unique world!
description.fr:
Shinta s'est perfectionné 13 ans durant afin d'atteindre le statut de Shin'uchi, le plus haut rang des rakugo-ka. Mais malgré sa très bonne performance lors de l'examen de passage, le juge de l'épreuve, l'émérite Maître Arakawa Issho, a décidé de renvoyer de l'école Arakawa l'ensemble des participants sans donner davantage d'explication ! Ainsi s'arrêta nette la carrière de Shinta, qui avait tant sacrifié pour accomplir son rêve…
Mais Akane, la fille de Shinta qui admirait son père et son rakugo plus que tout, ne compte pas en rester là !
description.th:
ที่สุดแห่งศิลปะการเล่าเรื่องที่ใช้ผู้แสดงเพียงหนึ่งคนและเรื่องเล่าเพียงหนึ่งเรื่อง --- "ราคุโกะ" นักราคุโกะ อาราคาวะ ชินตะและอาคาเนะลูกสาวของเขาต่างก็หลงเสน่ห์ของความบันเทิงอันสุดแสนจะเรียบง่ายนี้ ในวันที่ชินตะขึ้นเวทีแสดงในการสอบเลื่อนชั้นเป็นชินอุจิ อาคาเนะเองก็ได้ชมการแสดงนั้นอยู่และเส้นทางของนักราคุโกะที่อาคาเนะตัดสินใจก้าวเดินไปก็คือ---- มังงะราคุโกะขนานแท้ที่เหล่านักราคุโกะล้วนมาประชันฝีมือฟาดฟันกันได้เปิดฉากขึ้นแล้ว!

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.pt-br:
Rakugo - a forma perfeita de contar histórias, na qual tudo é expresso apenas com seu corpo e palavras. 
Shinta e sua filha, Akane, foram seduzidos por essa maravilhosa forma clássica de entretenimento. 
Observando seu pai treinar para passar no teste de Shin’uchi, Akane avança neste mundo único.

altTitles.ja: 2.5次元の誘惑

altTitles.en: 2.5 Dimensional Seduction

altTitles.th: 2.5 มิติ ริริสะ

description.en:
From Seven Seas:
“I have no interest in real girls!” So claims Okumura, the president of the school’s manga club. He’s your typical otaku, obsessed with a sexy (fictional) 2D manga character known as Liliel. Then the new school year starts, and a (real!) 3D girl named Lilysa whose passion is cosplay joins the club. Lilysa convinces Okumura to become her photographer–and guess who her favorite manga character is? Not only that, but Lilysa is into modeling the fetishy stuff, The boundaries between 2D and 3D start to blur as this hot-blooded romantic comedy unfolds.

English volumes by [Seven Seas Entertainment](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/2-5-dimensional-seduction/)
description.ja: 現実の女に興味無し！俺の嫁・リリエルは2次元にあり！そんな漫研部長・奥村の前に現れたのは…リアルなリリエル？ドキドキコスプレコメディ開幕！
description.pt:
"Eu não estou interessado em uma mulher real! Minha waifu Liliel está no mundo 2D!" Okumura, presidente do clube de mangá, um dia na sua frente apareceu… uma Liliel real?  
Uma super comédia empolgante começa!
description.pt-br: "Eu não estou interessado em uma mulher real! Minha waifu, Liriel está no mundo 2D!" Okumura, presidente do clube de mangá, um dia na sua frente apareceu... uma Liriel real? Uma super comédia empolgante começa!

description.en:
Two childhood friends—Black, an emotional fashion designer with selective amnesia, and White, a rational writer who’s been absent for two years—reunite to confront their traumatic pasts and navigate the fragile space between heart and mind as they struggle to preserve their friendship on the brink of adulthood.
Grey is... is a deeply emotional coming-of-age series about the messy journey of self-discovery, about friendship, and about the delicate balance between emotion and reason.

In a world where prehispanic cultures developed an steam powered industrial technology, a young redheaded girl — the huntress Metzli — is tracking an interesting bounty. Maybe this commission is bigger than she expects. 

"It's like The Witcher but in Mexico" - a random guy, probably
description.es-la:
Sigue las aventuras de Metzli, una cazadora de monstruos tratando de ganar el pan del día a día para ella y sus hermanos. 

“Es como si the Witcher ocurriera en Mexico” – Un weon, probablemente

altTitles.en: Imperfect Girl

altTitles.ja: 少女不十分

description.en:
An aspiring author. A mysterious little girl.  
Two completely unrelated people.  
What will happen when they meet?
description.es-la: El protagonista, un autor, cuenta la historia de su encuentro con cierta joven hace diez años. Durante sus días universitarios, una vez fue testigo de un accidente de tráfico en el que un estudiante de primaria fue atropellado por un camión. Extrañamente, la amiga de la chica, que estaba cerca, sólo se acercó a verla después de guardar cuidadosamente el juego que había estado jugando justo antes. Poco después, el protagonista se encontró capturado y confinado por esta chica.
description.pt-br:
Um aspirante a autor. Uma garotinha misteriosa.
Duas pessoas sem nenhuma relação.
O que acontecerá quando eles se encontrarem?

title.en: Ore no Ie ga Maryoku Spot datta Ken: Sundeiru dake de Sekai Saikyou

altTitles.fr: Ma maison est une zone de convergence magique: Uniquement en vivant là je suis le plus fort du monde

altTitles.ru: Мой дом — это место волшебной силы

altTitles.ja: 俺の家が魔力スポットだった件 ～住んでいるだけで世界最強～

altTitles.zh-hk: 原来我家是魔力点~只是住在那里就变成世界最强~

altTitles.ko: 우리 집이 마력스팟이었던 건에 대하여 ~살고 있는 것만으로 세계최강~

altTitles.pt-br: Minha casa está em um ponto mágico de poder, por morar lá eu me tornei o mais forte do mundo

altTitles.en: My House is a Magic Power Spot: Just by Living there I Become the Strongest in the World

altTitles.ja-ro: Ore no Ie ga Maryoku Spot datta Ken: Sundeiru dake de Sekai Saikyou

description.en: Living carefree at home is the greatest shortcut—my house is the world’s greatest Magic Power Spot. That being the case, both my house and I were summoned to another world by some guys who were aiming for it. However, I’ve been living in this place for many years and my body is, apparently, abnormally overflowing with magic. Due to some unforeseen circumstances by those guys who summoned me, they quickly ran away. Be that as it may, there are still some ill-mannered people who covet the magic leaking out of my house. I won’t give up my house to those people! I’m going to wield my power as I please!
description.ja: 自宅でのんびりすることが、最強への近道だった――。強力な魔力スポットの上に建つ一軒家に住んでいた普通の青年ダイチ。 ある日、それを狙うやつらに家ごと異世界に召喚されてしまう!!　だが、長年魔力スポットに住み続け、魔力が貯めこまれたダイチは敵を一蹴！　さらにかわいい我が家の精霊サクラも現れて至れり尽くせり！　最強の魔力を持ったダイチが望むものはただ一つ――それは自宅で平穏に暮らすこと！
description.ru:
Жить беззаботно в своём доме — это, несомненно, великолепно. Но мой дом — самое большое в мире место волшебной силы. Каким-то образом вышло так, что меня с моим домом перенесло в другой мир. Выяснилось, что меня призвали какие-то парни, которые хотели присвоить магию моего дома себе. Тем не менее, я живу в этом месте в течение многих лет, и мое тело, по-видимому, аномально переполнено магией. Из-за каких-то непредвиденных обстоятельств те ребята, которые меня вызвали, быстро убежали. Как бы то ни было, все ещё есть невоспитанные люди, которые жаждут магии, просачивающейся из моего дома. Я не отдам свой дом никому! Я буду использовать свою силу, как захочу!   

- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5915da/) (Raw)
description.es-la: Vivir sin preocupaciones en casa es el mejor atajo: mi casa es el mayor punto de poder mágico del mundo. Siendo ese el caso, tanto mi casa como yo fuimos invocados a otro mundo. Sin embargo, he estado viviendo en este lugar durante muchos años y aparentemente mi cuerpo está desbordado magia. Debido a circunstancias imprevistas por parte de los tipos que me invocaron, huyeron rápidamente. Como sea, todavía hay algunas personas mal educadas que codician la magia que escapa de mi casa. ¡No voy a ceder mi casa a esas personas! ¡Voy a ejercer mi poder como me plazca!
description.pt-br: Viver despreocupado em casa é a melhor coisa... minha casa é o maior ponto de força mágica do mundo. Sendo esse o caso, tanto minha casa quanto eu fomos convocados para outro mundo por algumas pessoas que estavam visado isso. No entanto, eu moro neste lugar há muitos anos e meu corpo está, aparentemente, transbordando de forma anormal com a magia. Devido a algumas circunstâncias imprevistas por aquelas pessoas que me chamaram, elas rapidamente fugiram. Seja como for, ainda há algumas pessoas mal-educadas que cobiçam a magia que vaza da minha casa. Eu não vou desistir da minha casa para essas pessoas! Vou usar meu poder como quiser!

title.en: "Monban Yattero" to Iware Juugo Nen, Tsuttatetteru Aida ni Ore no Maryoku ga 9999 "Saikyou" ni Sodattemashita

altTitles.ja: 「門番やってろ」と言われ15年、突っ立ってる間に俺の魔力が9999（最強）に育ってました

altTitles.ja-ro: "Monban Yattero" to Iware 15 Nen, Tsuttatetteru Aida ni Ore no Maryoku ga 9999 "Saikyou" ni Sodattemashita

altTitles.en: "Being Told 'Do Your Best' for 15 Years, My Magical Power Has Grown to 9999 'The Strongest'."

description.en: Although Royle is blessed with a good physique, he was told that he had no talent for fighting, and was forced to work as a lonely gatekeeper for 15 years. While he is working, all he can do is fantasize about the adventure stories in which he is the main character, and his job as gatekeeper is replaced by an “automatic surveillance interception magic tool” and he is laid off.Loyle is at a loss, but along the way he meets the saint Diz. After meeting her, he discovers that the “strongest original magic” that was available in her delusions can be used in reality…An exhilarating story about the strongest man with no communication skills and 9999 magic power who becomes an adventurer and becomes unrivaled!

altTitles.ja: 魔王になったので、ダンジョン造って人外娘とほのぼのする

altTitles.zh: 魔王建造地下城转生到异世界建造人外娘

I Became the Demon Lord so I Created a Dungeon and Spend Heartwarming Time There with Non-Human Girls

altTitles.ja-ro: Maou ni Natta node, Dungeon Tsukutte Jingai Musume to Honobono suru

altTitles.vi: Sau Khi Tôi Là 1 Ma Vương, Tôi Sẽ Xây Dựng Hầm Ngục Cùng Với Các Nô Lệ!

description.en:
Before I realized, I had become the guardian of a dungeon, a Demon Lord. I was suddenly in a dangerous world with giant monsters loitering around, fighting for their existence. So I thought to go about developing the dungeon in order to not die, but for some reason I was having quite the good time…. How did it turn out like this?  
  
The protagonist, Yuki, having to live in that world now, uses his bold and sharp senses and spends time with a supreme dragon girl and a vampire girl, sometimes laughing, sometimes being angry, passing days doing what he likes.
description.ja: 異世界転生したユキは、気付くとダンジョンの魔王になっていた!? チートな強さで人外娘達を助けたり、超便利なカタログ通販（？）でダンジョンに凶悪な罠を仕掛けたりとやりたい放題。自由と平和を守るため、快適＆最凶ダンジョン造りを目指せ！ 人気WEB小説コミカライズ!!
description.vi: Trước khi nhận ra, tôi đã trở thành người bảo vệ của một ngục tối, một Chúa Quỷ. Tôi bỗng nhiên bị cuốn vào một thế giới nguy hiểm với những con quái vật khổng lồ lang thang quanh đó, chiến đấu để tồn tại. Vì vậy, tôi quyết định phát triển ngục tối để không bị chết, nhưng không hiểu sao tôi lại cảm thấy khá thích thú với việc này... Làm sao mà lại trở thành như vậy? Nhân vật chính, Yuki, buộc phải sống trong thế giới này, sử dụng khả năng nhạy bén và tinh tế của mình, cùng thời gian bên một cô gái rồng tối thượng và một cô gái ma cà rồng, đôi khi cười, đôi khi tức giận, trải qua những ngày tháng làm những gì mình thích
description.es-la: Antes de darme cuenta, me había convertido en el guardián de una mazmorra, un Señor Demonio. De repente, estaba en un mundo peligroso con monstruos gigantes holgazaneando, luchando por la existencia de la mazmorra para no morir, pero por alguna razón estaba pasando un buen momento ... ¿Cómo resultó esto? El protagonista, Yuki, usa sus sentidos audaces y agudos y pasa el tiempo con una niña dragón suprema y una niña vampiro; A veces riendo, a veces enojándose, pasando días haciendo lo que le gusta.
description.pt-br:
Antes que eu percebesse, eu havia me tornado o guardião de uma masmorra, um Lorde Demônio.  De repente, eu estava em um mundo perigoso com monstros gigantes vagando por aí, lutando por sua existência, então pensei em desenvolver a masmorra para não morrer, mas – por algum motivo eu estava me divertindo bastante….  Como ficou assim?

 O protagonista, Yuki, tendo que viver naquele mundo agora, usa seus sentidos ousados ​​e afiados e passa o tempo com uma suprema garota dragão e uma garota vampira;  Às vezes rindo, às vezes com raiva, passando dias fazendo o que gosta.

altTitles.ja: 姉のともだち

altTitles.en: My Older Sister's Friend
The Cutest Girl Closest to Me.

altTitles.pt-br: A Amiga da Minha Irmã Mais Velha

description.en:
Hinako, a friend of Asahi's older sister, is a frequent guest at the home of the high school boy. She always misleads his mind with her suggestive attitude while treating him like a little brother...or rather, pet? A love story between a gal who has a bugged sense of proximity and an otaku guy who acts like her parent! 

---
**Chapters 1 & 2 can be found in the [Pre-Serialization](https://mangadex.org/title/abad18cf-bf72-4bbc-97c8-b55dfa28f9b9/ane-no-yuujin).**
description.es: En la casa donde vive con su hermana, Hi-chan, la amiga de su hermana, se queda frecuentemente. Ella tiene una cara perfectamente linda, y además de eso, no tiene sentido del espacio personal. Asahi, un estudiante de preparatoria otaku, ¿quedará a su merced...? ¡El popular one-shop “The Cutest Girl Closest to Me” ha sido retitulado y serializado!
description.ja: 姉とふたり暮らしの家にいりびたる、姉の友人・ひーちゃん。完璧に顔がよくてかわいい彼女に、オタク男子高校生・旭は翻弄されっぱなし…?
description.pt-br: Hinako, amiga da irmã mais velha de Asahi, é uma visitante frequente na casa do garoto do ensino médio. Ela está sempre confundindo a mente dele com sua atitude sugestiva, enquanto o trata como um irmãozinho... ou melhor, como um bichinho de estimação? Uma história de amor entre uma gyaru com um senso deturpado de proximidade e um otaku que age como se fosse o pai dela!

title.en: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

altTitles.ja: エクソシストを堕とせない

altTitles.th: เอ็กซอร์ซิส ไม่มีวันตกหลุมรัก

altTitles.ja-ro: Exorcist wo Otosenai

altTitles.fr: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

description.en: As the strongest exorcist, a boy chosen by God was engaged in mortal combat with the Demon Kings. Although he bears the fate of humanity on his shoulders, he actually wants to make sweets peacefully. One day, he meets a girl... This is a story of love and hope growing in the midst of a holy war.
description.fr: Un jeune prêtre, entraîné par le Vatican pour devenir l'exorciste le plus puissant du monde, reçoit pour mission divine de protéger une jeune artiste, Imuri Atsuki. Sur les conseils de son mentor, il espère néanmoins trouver l'amour afin de soulager son esprit du lourd fardeau qui lui incombe. Imuri sera-t-elle celle qui lui apportera son salut ?
description.ja: 神に選ばれし少年は、最強のエクソシストとして魔王たちと死闘を繰り広げていた。人類の命運を背負いつつも本当は静かにお菓子作りをしていたい、そんな彼に訪れた一人の少女との出会い…。これは壮絶な聖戦の中で芽吹いた、恋と希望の物語。

altTitles.fr: La vilaine vit encore une fois

altTitles.ja: 悪女は2度生きる
悪女は２度生きる

altTitles.th: ชีวิตที่สองของนางร้าย
ชีวิตครั้งใหม่ ของยัยตัวร้าย

description.de:
Von klein auf lebte Artezia Rosan in dem Glauben, sie könne ein glückliches Leben führen, solange ihr Bruder erfolgreich ist. Als Meisterin der Manipulation und Intrigen wurde sie das wichtigste Hilfsmittel ihres Bruders, um den Thron des Imperiums zu erobern. Genau deshalb traf sie der Verrat ihres Bruders so hart, als sie für ihre Taten gefesselt und gefoltert wurde. Nachdem sie von Großherzog Cedric Ebron gerettet wird, nutzt sie eine verbotene Magie und opfert ihr eigenes Leben, um ihm zu helfen, dem grausamen Kaiser ein Ende zu setzen. Die Ereignisse nehmen eine seltsame Wendung, als sie einige Jahre in der Vergangenheit aufwacht und schwört, Großherzog Cedric um jeden Preis zu helfen, selbst wenn dies bedeutet, ihre eigene Familie aufzugeben. Man sagt, Blut ist dicker als Wasser, aber kann Artezia es schaffen, ihren Bruder zu besiegen, während ihre eigene Romanze inmitten des Chaos erblüht?

---
* [Official Translation (DE)](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/the-villainess-lives-again-de)
description.en: From childhood, Artezia Rosan's happiness was dependent on ensuring the success of her brother. As a master manipulator and schemer, she became his most valuable ally in seizing the empire’s throne. That’s exactly why her brother's betrayal cut so deeply when Artezia was imprisoned as punishment for all of her crimes. Soon after being rescued by Grand Duke Cedric Ebron, she vows to help him overthrow the cruel new emperor by sacrificing her own life with forbidden magic. Now waking up several years earlier back in time, she will forsake her own family to help Cedric at all costs. They say that blood is thicker than water, but can Artezia destroy her brother while her own romance blossoms amidst the chaos?
description.fr:
Depuis son plus jeune âge, Artezia vit dans l’ombre de son frère, dont le succès suffirait à garantir le bonheur et la sécurité de la famille, selon sa mère. Elle devient donc la meilleure alliée de ce dernier, organisant maintes conspirations afin de l’aider à accéder au trône impérial. C’est pourquoi, quand ce but est finalement atteint mais qu’elle se retrouve trahie, mutilée et enchaînée en punition pour ses crimes, son ressentiment n’en est que plus grand. Sauvée par le Grand Duc Cedric Ebron, elle décide alors d’utiliser la magie pour aider ce dernier à détrôner l’empereur cruel qu’est devenu son frère. Un sort magique lui permet de revenir plusieurs années en arrière et de changer le cours des choses… Mais Artezia parviendra-t-elle à changer le destin, alors que l’amour s'immisce au milieu du chaos?

---
**Official Translations:**
* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/villainess-lives-again-fr)
description.ja:
謀略の天才、皇帝を作り上げる！ ”お兄様が成功すれば、お前も成功するのよ” それを信じ、あらゆる悪事を企てた悪女「アルティゼア」。 しかし、彼女の兄への忠誠は裏切りとして返ってくる。 死を前にした彼女に手を差し伸べたのは宿敵であり、正義ある大公「セドリック」だけだった。 魔術で命と引き換えに18歳の自分に生まれ変わった彼女は、「セドリック」を皇帝にするために新たな人生を捧げることにするがーー

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/50796)
description.ko:
모략의 천재, 황제를 만들다!

"오빠가 잘되어야 너도 잘되는 거야."

온갖 악행을 저질러 오빠를 황제로 만들었다.
하지만 아르티제아의 헌신은 배신으로 돌아왔다.
죽음의 문턱에서 그녀에게 구원의 손을 내민 것은, 정의로운 숙적 세드릭 대공뿐이었다.

“계책을 내라.”
“…….”
“이 상황을 뒤집을 수 있는 인물을 나는 그대 외에는 떠올리지 못하겠어. 로산 후작.”
“…….”
“나에게는 그대의 힘이 필요하다.”

이미 기울어진 세력 판도를 뒤집고 도탄에 빠진 제국을 구할 계책은 없다.
그러나 방법은 있다.
모든 것이 잘못되기 이전으로 시간을 돌리는 것.

피의 눈물과 함께 그녀는 자신의 몸을 바쳐 고대마법으로 시간을 돌린다.
이번에는, 실패하지 않으리라.

죽지 않고 18세로 회귀한 아르티제아는 세드릭 대공을 위한 악녀가 될 것을 결심한다.

“저에게 청혼해 주십시오. 당신을 황제로 만들어 드리겠습니다.”

악마에게 무릎을 꿇은 대가로,
당신은 당신 대신 손을 더럽힐 악마를 얻을 것입니다.
description.pt: Ao cometer todo tipo de atos malignos, ela fez do irmão o imperador. Mas sua dedicação foi recompensada com traição. À beira da morte, quem estendeu uma ajuda foi seu arqui-inimigo, o justo Grão-Duque Cedric.Não era possível restaurar o equilíbrio de poder para um império que já estava caindo em ruínas, mas havia uma maneira... de voltar no tempo antes que tudo desse errado. Com seu sangue e lágrimas, ela sacrifica seu próprio corpo para lançar magia antiga, a fim de voltar no tempo. Desta vez, ela não iria falhar.
description.ru:
«Твой старший брат хорош, и ты должна соответствовать.»
Она совершила множество злoдеяний, чтoбы сделать своего старшего брата Императором. Однако преданность Артезии обернулась против неё, ведь единственным, кто подал ей руку помощи на пороге смерти, был заклятый враг, эрцгерцог Седрик.
«Уловки прочь.»
«Я не знаю никого, кроме вас, кто мог бы обратить эту ситуацию вспять. Маркиза Розанна.»
«Мне нужна ваша сила.»
Казалось, тогда уже невозможно было спасти Империю, находившуюся в крайне бедственном положении, и предотвратить падение власти. Но всё же был один способ. Повернуть время вспять прежде, чем все пойдёт не так. Она, с кровавыми слезами на глазах, пожертвовала своим телом, чтобы овладеть древней магией и обернуть время вспять. В этот раз она не подведёт. Вернувшись в возраст восемнадцати лет, Артезия принимает решение не покорно умереть, а стать злодейкой и пойти на службу к эрцгерцогу Седрику.
«Пожалуйста, сделайте мне предложение. И я сделаю вас Императором.»
Дабы демoн пал ниц, нужнo запoлучить другoгo, что испачкает руки вместо вас.
description.zh:
前世为助哥哥成王做尽坏事，却反遭灭口…这一世甘为恶女，联手曾经的政治宿敌，夺回操控人生的王座！

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9146/)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E6%83%A1%E5%A5%B3%E9%87%8D%E7%94%9F/116)
description.pt-br: Ao cometer todo tipo de atos malignos, ela fez do irmão o imperador. Mas sua dedicação foi recompensada com traição. À beira da morte, quem estendeu uma ajuda foi seu arqui-inimigo, o justo Grão-Duque Cedric. Não era possível restaurar o equilíbrio de poder para um império que já estava caindo em ruínas, mas havia uma maneira … de voltar no tempo antes que tudo desse errado. Com seu sangue e lágrimas, ela sacrifica seu próprio corpo para lançar magia antiga, a fim de voltar no tempo. Desta vez, ela não iria falhar.

title.en: Iinazuke ga Dekita to Omottara, Sono Iinazuke ga Gakkou de Yuumei na "Akuyaku Reijou" Dattan dakedo, Dou Sureba Ii?

altTitles.ja: 許嫁が出来たと思ったら、その許嫁が学校で有名な『悪役令嬢』だったんだけど、どうすればいい？

altTitles.ja-ro: Iinazuke ga Dekita to Omottara, Sono Iinazuke ga Gakkou de Yuumei na "Akuyaku Reijou" datta n dakedo, Dou Sureba Ii?

altTitles.en: It Turns Out That I Have a Fiancée, but She Is the Famous "Villainess" of the School. What Should I Do?

altTitles.pt-br: Acontece que eu tenho uma noiva, mas ela é a famosa "vilã" da escola. O que devo fazer?

description.en:
"I have a fiancée...?"

One day, Higashi Kujou Hiroyuki, an ordinary high school student, is told a surprising fact by his father about an arranged engagement.

His fiancée is Kiryu Ayane, the "Villainess" at school, known to everyone for her sharp tongue and coldhearted personality. 

A heartwarming love story of two high school students that melts the icy heart of a "Villainess" begins!
description.ja:
許嫁がいる……ある日、父から驚きの事実を聞かされた普通の高校生・東九条浩之。
その許嫁とは、学園の誰もが知る、クールでドライな“悪役令嬢”・桐生彩音だった!?

悪役令嬢の氷の心を溶かす、高校生たちの胸あつく少しせつない恋愛ストーリー――！
description.pt-br:
"Eu tenho uma noiva...?"

Um dia, Higashi Kujou Hiroyuki, um estudante comum do ensino médio, ouve um fato surpreendente de seu pai sobre um noivado arranjado.

Sua noiva é Kiryuu Ayane, a "Vilã" da escola, conhecida por todos por sua língua afiada e personalidade fria.

Uma história de amor comovente de dois estudantes do ensino médio que derrete o coração gelado de uma "Vilã" começa!

altTitles.ja-ro: RokuBuru

altTitles.ja: ろくでなしBLUES

altTitles.ja-ro: Rokudenashi Blues

description.en:
Maeda is a new student in the Teiken High School. He stutters when he's nervous and he's rather clumsy. He gets noted immediately because he hits a teacher during the entrance ceremony. Some clubs search to enlist him as they see in him a force they can use to get even with other clubs. But Maeda is a loner and has only one dream: becoming boxing champion. His first objective is to beat the leader of the boxing club. "Rokudenashi" translates as "good for nothing".  
  
The manga focuses more on gang warfare than boxing.
description.es:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.
description.vi:
Maeda Taison, chàng thiếu niên tới từ Osaka mang trong mình ước mơ trở thành nhà vô địch boxing thế giới. Xuyên suốt 3 năm học của cậu không chỉ là những trận đánh, những xung đột mà còn có cả những câu chuyện đầy tính nhân văn.
Huyền thoại của dòng manga yankee Nhật Bản, dù đã kết thúc từ năm 1997 nhưng Rokudenashi Blues (RB) vẫn đang là bộ manga yankee bán chạy nhất mọi thời đại. Vì kết thúc đã lâu nên nội dung của nó có phần "outdate", tuy nhiên vẫn rất đáng đọc.
description.es-la:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.

altTitles.en: I'm Going to Rewrite the Devastating Novel
I Will Rewrite the Dead End Novel

description.en:
[Let's get rid of this psychopath before that]

Yes, I possessed someone.

But who I was in my previous life.
I can't remember at all.

All I remember is,
just this guy's face that filled my eyes.

The day I woke up for the first time as a wizard's experiment,
we were together.

Strangely enough, about my previous life,
this guy seems to know better about it than I do.

In a dead-end novel,
you are the only one you can trust and rely on...

In order to live,
I have to run away from this guy.

In the future, he will kill the female lead's entire family.
It's because he's a psychopath whose view on the world is final darkness.

After a while...

Finally, out of his grasp,
I thought I could live a peaceful life─

"You cruelly abandoned me."

This guy, he finally found me.

"Did you enjoy playing with me?"

Now, he can't even be compared to his past self.
He went completely mad.
description.ko:
[그 전에 이 사이코패스부터 치워버리고요]

그래, 빙의했다.

그런데 내가 전생에 누구였는지
도무지 기억이 나지 않는다. 

기억나는 것이라고는,
눈 앞을 가득 채우던 이 녀석의 얼굴뿐.

마법사의 실험체로서 처음으로 눈 뜬 그 날
우린 함께 태어났다.

이상하게도 내 전생에 대해
나보다도 더 잘 알고 있는 것 같은 이녀석.

이 막장의 끝을 달리는 피폐한 소설 속에서
유일하게 믿고 의지할 수 있는 존재여야하건만…

살기 위해서는,
이놈에게서 도망쳐야 한다.

장차 여자주인공의 가족을 모두 살해하고
세계관 최종 흑막에 등극하는 사이코패스니까. 

시간이 흐른 뒤…

마침내 녀석의 손아귀에 벗어나
평화로운 일상을 맞이하나 싶었는데─

"너는 잔인하게 날 버리고 떠났지."

기어코 나를 찾아내고 말았다, 이 녀석은. 

"날 가지고 노는 동안 즐거웠나?"

그것도 과거와 비교도 안될 만큼
단단히 미쳐버린 채로.

title.en: Marika-chan no Koukando wa Bukkowarete iru

altTitles.ja: 茉莉花ちゃんの好感度はぶっ壊れている

altTitles.id: Status Bar yang menunjukkan rasa suka Marika-chan rusak

altTitles.en: Marika-chan's affection meter is completely broken.

altTitles.es-la: El Medidor De Afecto De Marika-San Esta Completamente Roto

altTitles.pt-br: O medidor de afeto da Marika-chan está completamente quebrado.

description.en:
I’ve gained the ability to see the affection levels of the girl I like.──I don’t have the courage to confess my feelings to my childhood friend, Marika-chan. One day, I made a strong wish upon a shooting star: "I wish I could understand the feelings of others, like in a dating game." Then, that wish came true...!?

Floating above the girls in my class are affection meters. While confused by this surreal sight, I decide to check Marika-chan’s meter, only to find it has broken past its limits, turning into a hellish meter...!?

Marika-chan, you don’t like me, so why are you so kind to me...?
──What is Marika-chan’s hidden truth behind her cute façade? Does she really hate me!? Or is it something else...!?
description.id:
Aku tiba-tiba bisa melihat tingkat rasa suka dari gadis yang kusukai.──Aku tidak punya keberanian untuk menyatakan cinta pada teman masa kecilku, Marika-chan. Suatu hari, aku membuat permohonan yang sangat kuat pada bintang jatuh: "Aku berharap bisa memahami perasaan orang lain, seperti di dalam game romansa." Dan ternyata, permohonan itu terkabul...!?

Di atas kepala para gadis di kelasku, muncul status bar yang menunjukkan rasa suka. Dalam kebingunganku melihat pemandangan aneh ini, aku memutuskan untuk memeriksa status barnya Marika-chan. Namun, status barnya justru melebihi batas, berubah menjadi status bar "neraka" yang benar-benar kacau...!?

Marika-chan, kalau kau tidak menyukaiku, kenapa kau begitu baik padaku...?
──Apa rahasia sebenarnya di balik sikap Marika-chan yang manis dan menggemaskan? Apakah dia benar-benar membenciku!? Atau mungkin sebenarnya...!?
description.ja:
あらすじ・内容
好きな子からの好感度が見えるようになりました。──幼馴染の茉莉花ちゃんに告白する勇気の無い僕。ある日、流れ星に強く願った「恋愛ゲームみたいに相手の気持ちがわかるようになりますように」すると、その願いは叶ってしまい…!?クラスの女子達に浮かぶ好感度メーター。非現実な光景に戸惑いながらも茉莉花ちゃんのを見に行くと、下限突破した地獄のメーターになっていて…!?茉莉花ちゃん、僕のこと嫌いなのにどうしてそんなに優しかったの…？――裏アリ可愛い茉莉花ちゃんの隠された本音は？本当にキライなの!?それとも…!?
description.pt-br:
Eu ganhei a habilidade de ver os níveis de afeição da garota de quem gosto. ──Eu não tenho coragem de confessar meus sentimentos à minha amiga de infância, Marika-chan. Um dia, fiz um desejo forte a uma estrela cadente: "Eu queria poder entender os sentimentos dos outros, como em um jogo de namoro." Então, esse desejo se tornou realidade...!?

Flutuando acima das garotas da minha turma estão medidores de afeição. Enquanto fico confuso com essa visão surreal, decido verificar o medidor da Marika-chan, apenas para descobrir que ele ultrapassou os limites, transformando-se em um medidor infernal...!?

Marika-chan, você não gosta de mim, então por que é tão gentil comigo...?
──Qual é a verdade oculta de Marika-chan por trás de sua fachada fofa? Ela realmente me odeia!? Ou é algo mais...?

title.en: I'll Try to End the Male Lead

altTitles.en: I Will Try to End the Male Lead
I'm Going to Kill the Male Lead
I'll Kill the Male Lead

altTitles.ja: 男主人公を殺す筋書きを描いてみます

description.en:
I, Kwon Jinha, began feeling sick after reading a romance novel.

I became connected to all the emotions and sensations of the female lead, Elvi.

I even went to the hospital due to severe pain and sorrow but the result said there’s nothing wrong with my body.

So, I ended up sending an email to the novel’s author, begging for the male lead to stop tormenting the female lead. But instead, all I got was a happy reply...

“Do your job properly, Elvi”.

I found myself possessing Elvi’s body in the novel.

I got slapped by the male lead as soon as I possessed Elvi’s body, upon that, I had only one thought.

“The male lead? It’s over if I kill him, right?”
description.ko:
로판 소설을 읽고 몸이 아파오던 나 권진하.

여주인공 엘비가 느끼는 감정과 감각이 모두 연결되어버렸다.

끔찍한 통증과 슬픔에 병원까지 찾아갔지만 몸에는 이상무.

결국 소설 작가에게 메일을 보냈다.

제발 쓰레기 남주가 여주 좀 그만 괴롭히게.

하지만 메일을 보냈더니 사이다 답장은커녕….

“일은 똑바로 해야지, 엘비.”

소설 속 엘비에게로 빙의해버렸다.

빙의하자마자 뺨을 올려붙이는 남주를 보고 든 생각은 하나뿐.

남주? 죽여버리면 그만이지.

altTitles.en: Will you expose yourself today?!

description.en: Mini is a "Scum Detector", and her latest job is from a rich girl who wants to test her boyfriend's loyalty. However, her boyfriend, Zhao Yueming, is a straightforward gentleman, and Mini's usual methods don't work on him. This is a bit tricky for Mini, who is used to dealing with scumbags regularly. This game of tug-of-war between the womanizer and the one who understands them best is about to begin. Who will fall into the trap of love first?!

title.ja: Saijo no Osewa Takane no Hana-darakena Meimon-kou de, Gakuin Ichi no Ojou-sama (Seikatsu Nouryoku Kaimu) wo Kagenagara Osewa suru Koto ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: 才女のお世話 高嶺の花だらけな名門校で、学院一のお嬢様（生活能力皆無）を陰ながらお世話することになりました

altTitles.en: I Was Assigned to Take Care of the Most Talented Young Lady (With No Life Skills) at a Prestigious School Full of High Achievers

altTitles.vi: Làm Bảo Mẫu Cho Tiểu Thư

description.en: A poor high school boy, Izuki Tomonari, got caught up in a kidnapping attempt on Hinako Konohana, a young lady from one of Japan's largest conglomerates. On the surface, Hinako appears to be a brilliant and beautiful young woman, but in reality, she is a lazy girl with no life skills. However, due to family reasons, Hinako has to play the role of the "perfect young lady" at school. Wanting to protect her, Izuki took on the job of caring for her. Eventually, Hinako began to spoil Izuki with all her might. "I don't want... Izuki to leave my side right now." This is a love story that begins beyond the master-servant relationship featuring a princess with a beautiful facade.
description.ja: 男子高校生・友成伊月は、誘拐に巻き込まれたことが切っ掛けで、日本随一の財閥のお嬢様・此花雛子のお世話係をすることに。 表向きは才色兼備な雛子だが、その正体は生活能力皆無のぐうたら娘だった。しかし、家の都合で、学院では「完璧なお嬢様」を演じなければならない雛子。そんな彼女を守りたいと思い、甲斐甲斐しく世話を焼く伊月。やがて雛子も伊月に全力で甘えてくるようになって――「今は……伊月が傍にいない方が、嫌」ギャップ可愛いお嬢様との主従を越えて始まる恋物語。
description.pt-br: O estudante do ensino médio Itzuki Tomonari se envolveu em um sequestro e se viu lidando com Konohana Hinako, a herdeira do maior conglomerado do Japão. Hinako parece ser uma jovem inteligente e bonita, mas sua verdadeira identidade é preguiçosa, sem capacidade para viver sozinha. No entanto, devido às circunstâncias em casa, Hinako tem que interpretar a "ojou-sama perfeita" na academia. Uma história de amor que começa além de mestre-servo com uma linda jovem.

title.en: I Became the Only Healer in This World

altTitles.ru: Я стала единственным хилером в этом мире

altTitles.ja: この世界で唯一のヒーラーになりました

description.en:
Healer who is addicted to gambling has been on a single path for years. Somehow, the world changed and I became the world's only healer. [There is a place that needs you, a unique healer.] [Will you respond to the summons?] ‘What? 'You have a tank dealer but no healer?' No, what. Is there any balance for X network with tank damage but no healer? [The constellations watching you complain that this is not a game, but reality!] *** It has been several decades since the Gate appeared. I heard that a lot of strategies and data have been accumulated over the years. ‘Why is everyone proceeding so inefficiently? 'Frustrating?' I was serious about my strategy, so I just tried my best to close the gate. “It was you who saved me. “I made it so that only you can see it.” 1st place in the former rankings who were said to have been betrayed and went into hiding. “I need you. my savior “My life.” Head of the world's top 10 guild unions. “Don’t abandon me. Because I can’t breathe without you.” Up to 1st place in the current ranking. I was too busy clearing the gate, but strange guys started to come by. 

[Plate/Constellation/Hunter/Himsumjin/Munchkin/Yeojuwon Tower/Salvation]
description.ru:
Девушка, играющая за хилера на протяжении многих лет, так и не смогла ничего достичь. Однажды, невероятным образом она переместилась в другой мир, в котором не оказалось ни одного хилера.  
— Есть пати, которое хочет пригласить вас, невероятного и неповторимого хилера. Вы ответите на призыв?  
"А? У них есть танки и ДД, но ни одного хилера? У них тут вообще хоть что-то сбалансированно?"  — 
Это не игра, а реальность. И созвездия, защищающие тебя, будут жаловаться тебе на жизнь!    

***  
Врата появились несколько десятилетий назад. За это время накопилось множество тактик и сведений, но...  
— Что за унылые атаки в лоб? Ещё не надоело?  
Из-за очень наивной тактики врата брали напролом.  
— Это вы ведь меня спасли? Лишь благодаря вашим способностями.  
Преданный, скрывающийся бывший первый ранг...  
— О, моя спасительница, не покидай меня.  
...директор ассоциации 10 гильдий...  
— Прошу, не бросай меня. Я не смогу жить без тебя.  
...и даже нынешний первый ранг — каждый был восхищен ею.  
Когда она была занята тактикой прохождения врат, начали появляться странные дети, что совершенно не входило в её планы.

title.en: Listener ni Damasarete Dungeon no Sai Kasou kara Dasshutsu RTA suru Koto ni Natta

altTitles.ja: リスナーに騙されてダンジョンの最下層から脱出ＲＴＡすることになった

altTitles.en: The Listeners Tricked Me Into Doing an Escape RTA From the Lowest Level of the Dungeon!

description.en:
A dungeon explorer, or dungeon tuber, is a person who explores dungeons while streaming. On his first day of broadcasting, a rookie dungeon tuber, Sekai Kotoba, is accidentally transported to the lowest level of the dungeon, which he has not yet explored. The bottom level is a sea of lava, and he is suddenly doomed!

He is level 2, his skills are non-combat related, and he has no knowledge of dungeons. The only people he can rely on are the listeners on the feed! Aim for the upper levels by relying on the comments!
description.ja:
事故で未踏破の最下層に転送されてしまった新人ダンチューバー・世迷言葉。頼れるのは配信にいるリスナーだけ!? どん底の状況から始まるダンジョン脱出冒険譚!!!

配信をしながらダンジョン探索をする者、ダンチューバー。新人ダンチューバー・世迷言葉は、初配信日に事故で未踏破の最下層に転送されてしまう。最下層に広がっていたのは溶岩の海でいきなり絶体絶命!?

レベル2、スキルは非戦闘系、ダンジョンに関する知識ゼロ。そんな言葉が頼れるのは配信にいるリスナーだけ!! コメントを頼りに上層を目指せ!!

description.en: Ye Ji-an, the only S-class guide in Korea, was often called the “useless guide” due to her unique trait of having a 0% matching rate with all espers. After failing to match with an esper from Russia and on her way back home, she is suddenly swept away by a gate manifestation and wakes up alone in a strange temple-like place. The world she has traveled to through the gate is the continent of Wisrode, filled only with espers, and in this place, Ji-an is the only guide…

title.en: S-Kyuu Boukensha ga Ayumu Michi: Tsuihou Sareta Shounen wa Shin no Nouryoku 'Buki Master' de Sekai Saikyou ni Itaru

altTitles.en: The Path of an S-Class Adventurer: The Exiled Boy Becomes the World's Strongest With His True Ability, "Weapon Master"

altTitles.ja-ro: S-Class Boukensha ga Ayumu Michi ~Tsuihou Sareta Shounen wa Shin no Nouryoku "Buki Master" de Sekai Saikyou ni Itaru~

altTitles.vi: Sau Khi Bị Trục Xuất, Tôi Trở Thành Mạnh Nhất Thế Giới Với Chúc Phúc "Bậc Thầy Vũ Khí"

altTitles.ja: Ｓ級冒険者が歩む道　 ～追放された少年は真の能力『武器マスター』で世界最強に至る～

altTitles.vi: Hành trình của mạo hiểm giả rank S: Tôi trở thành mạnh nhất thế giới với chúc phúc “Weapon Master”

altTitles.es-la: El Camino del Aventurero de Rango S: El Joven Exiliado se convierte en el más fuerte del mundo con su verdadera habilidad como "Maestro de armas".

description.en: Haise is a young boy who has been gifted with an unknown ability. He becomes an adventurer together with his childhood friend Sasha, but is kicked out of the team for being unable to use his ability and being a hindrance. Furthermore, while continuing his solo adventure, he is caught in a trap and falls into dire straits. Just as he is on the brink of death, Haise's ability "Weapon Master" awakens! It is a power that shakes the laws of the world, summoning weapons from another world! ? An unrivaled fantasy set in another world that begins with adversity!
description.ja: 詳細不明の能力を授けられた少年ハイセ。 彼は幼馴染のサーシャとともに冒険者になるも、能力が扱えず足手まといだとチームから追放されてしまう。 さらに一人冒険者を続ける最中、罠に嵌められて絶体絶命の危機に陥ることに。 死の淵に立たされたその時、ハイセの能力『武器マスター』が目を覚ます！ それは異世界の武器を喚び出すという世界の理をも揺るがす力で！？ 逆境から始まる、異世界無双ファンタジー開幕！

altTitles.ja: ラグナクリムゾン

altTitles.th: ตำนานนักล่ามังกร

description.en: Ragna is a dragon hunter along with his partner, the strongest dragon hunter Leo. He didn't have much talent at hunting dragons but he had decided to entrust his whole life for her. However he was shown the feel of true despair by his future self on what would happen if he stays weak as he is now. With that, it seems that the reaper of the dragons had now appeared earlier than the original history, but will it be enough to change the future?
description.es: Ragna es un cazador de dragones junto con su compañera, la cazadora de dragones más fuerte, Leo. No tenía mucho talento para cazar dragones, pero había decidido confiar toda su vida a ella. Sin embargo, su yo del futuro le mostró la verdadera desesperación de lo que le ocurriría si seguía siendo tan débil como hasta ahora. Con eso, parece que la parca de los dragones ha aparecido antes que en la historia original, pero ¿será suficiente para cambiar el futuro?
description.pt:
Ragna é um caçador de dragões junto com sua parceira, a mais forte caçadora de dragões, Leo. Ele não tinha muito talento para caçar dragões, mas decidiu confiar toda a sua vida a ela. No entanto, foi mostrado a ele a sensação do verdadeiro desespero pelo seu próprio eu do futuro, sobre o que aconteceria se ele permanecesse fraco como ele é agora. Com isso, parece que o ceifador dos dragões apareceu mais cedo do que na história original, mas será isso o suficiente para mudar o futuro?  
  
**Links**:  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Artist’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/D_Koba)
description.es-la: Ragna es un cazador de dragones junto con su compañera, la cazadora de dragones más fuerte, Leo. No tenía mucho talento para cazar dragones, pero había decidido confiar toda su vida a ella. Sin embargo, su yo del futuro le mostró la verdadera desesperación de lo que le ocurriría si seguía siendo tan débil como hasta ahora. Con eso, parece que la parca de los dragones ha aparecido antes que en la historia original, pero ¿será suficiente para cambiar el futuro?
description.pt-br: Ragna é um caçador de dragões junto com sua parceira, a mais forte caçadora de dragões, Leo. Ele não tinha muito talento para caçar dragões, mas decidiu confiar toda a sua vida a ela. No entanto, foi mostrado a ele a sensação do verdadeiro desespero pelo seu próprio eu do futuro, sobre o que aconteceria se ele permanecesse fraco como ele é agora. Com isso, parece que o shinigami dos dragões apareceu mais cedo do que na história original, mas será isso o suficiente para mudar o futuro?

altTitles.ja: 塩田先生と雨井ちゃん

description.en:
A teacher and student romance.  
  
Amai Yayoi, 16 years old.   
A high school girl who puts her heart into expressing her love for Shiota-sensei.  
  
Shiota Tsuguharu, 29 years old.  
A high school teacher who is steadily beginning to accept Amai-chan.
description.ru: Милая и романтическая история любви учителя и его ученицы.

altTitles.en: Kotaro Lives Alone

altTitles.ja: コタローは1人暮らし

description.en: One day, a kid named Satou Kotarou moved in next door to Karino Shin, an unsuccessful manga artist. Kotarou says he has no parents and lives alone. Karino is annoyed by Kotarou, but as he learns Kotarou's reasons for living alone, they gradually grow closer and grow together.
description.uk: Побутова комедія розповідає про чотирирічного хлопчика Котаро Сато, який заселяється у кімнату в апартаментах "Шімідзу" та сусідує з невдалим манґакою на ім’я Шін Каріно. Здається, малий не має батьків та живе один, маючи більшу зібраність, аніж його дивні сусіди.
description.pt-br:
Em um humilde apartamento, Kotarou, um garoto de 4 anos, surpreende a todos ao morar sozinho. Apesar da pouca idade, ele enfrenta os desafios da vida adulta com coragem e independência.

Por trás de sua fachada forte, Kotaro esconde um passado doloroso e um coração solitário. Conforme ele interage com seus vizinhos, segredos são revelados e laços de amizade se formam, mostrando que a família pode ser encontrada nos lugares mais improváveis.

altTitles.ja-ro: Hitomi-chan wa Hitomishiri
Hitomichan ha Hitomishiri

altTitles.ja: 瞳ちゃんは人見知り

altTitles.it: Hitomi-chan è timida con gli sconosciuti

description.en: One day, the ordinary 2nd year high schooler Yuu Usami accidentally encounters a big girl with a scary look. Turns out she's glaring at him, but why…?! Although Hitomi Takano looks like she's scary and awkward, she's actually a kind and adorable girl. This one shall be a happy, heartwarming slice-of-life comedy.
description.es:
Un día, el estudiante de 2do año Yuu Yusami se encuentra por accidente con una muchacha grande con una mirada temeraria. Resulta que ella símplemente lo está observando… pero ¿por qué? A pesar de que Hitomi Takano se ve espeluznante y huraña, ella en realidad es querida y adorable. Ésta será una feliz y grata comedia de la vida cotidiana.  
  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/oiVINmy.png) Mangaka’s Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/910858)  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Mangaka’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/cyorisukenosuke)
description.fr: Un jour, Yuu Usami – lycéen ordinaire en deuxième année – rencontre une grande fille avec un regard effrayant. Elle a l’air de le fusiller du regard, mais pourquoi…?! Pourtant, même si Hitomi Takano fait peur et est maladroite, elle est en réalité une fille gentille et adorable. Bienvenue dans une comédie/tranche de vie qui va vous réchauffer le cœur !
description.ja:
どこにでもいる平凡な高校2年生の宇佐見君は、ある日、偶然に居合わせた"何やら目つきが悪くていろいろとおっきな女の子"に、なぜか睨みつけられてしまい…!?
見た目は怖くて不器用だけど、実は優しくて可愛い三白眼女子の、楽しくてハートフルな日常コメディ…開幕!!
description.ru: Однажды обыкновенный старшеклассник 2-го года Юу Усами случайно встречает большую девушку со страшным взглядом. По какой-то причине она не отрывает от него глаз, но он ведь ей ничего не делал!.. Хотя Хитоми Такано выглядит страшной и неприветливой, на самом деле она добрая и очаровательная девушка.
description.pt-br: Em um dia comum, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, chamado Usami Yuu, se encontra acidentalmente com Takano Hitomi, uma garota alta e que tem um olhar assustador. Acontece que ela está olhando diretamente para ele. Mas embora Hitomi pareça assustadora e desajeitada, na verdade ela é uma garota gentil e adorável que simplesmente quer se tornar mais sociável.

title.en: Adventures of an Undead Who Became Paladin

altTitles.en: Marching Toward Klimatia

altTitles.zh-ro: Mài Xiàng Kè Lǐ Mǎ Shā

altTitles.ja: 骸骨だって騎士様を目指したい！

description.en: Read “Humility! Integrity! Compassion! Valor! Justice! Sacrifice! Honor! Faith!” He’s a lich, however, he’s knightly! He is a lich, but he keeps his faith in the light! “Fearless in the face of the enemy! Loyal and upright, he fights to the death! Why you may ask? Because protecting the weak is not against the law of the world!” This is the story of a cat with a bad mouth and a lich who gave his body and soul to the service of the Light!

altTitles.en: The Eminence in Shadow

altTitles.ja: 陰の実力者になりたくて！

altTitles.en: I Want To Be The Eminence In Shadow!
To Be a Power in the Shadows!

altTitles.vi: Ta Muốn Trở Thành Chúa Tể Bóng Tối!

description.en:
Just like how everyone adored heroes in their childhood, a certain young man adored those powers hidden in shadows. Ninjas, rogues, shadowy mentor types, that sort of deal.  
After hiding his strength and living the mediocre life of a NPC by day while undergoing frenzied training by night, he finally reincarnates into a different world and gains ultimate power.  
The young man who is only pretending to be a power in the shadows… his subordinates who took him more seriously than he expected… and a giant organization in the shadows that gets accidentally trampled…  
This is the story of a young boy who had adored powers in shadows possibly eventually reigning over the world of shadows in another world.
description.ru:
Подобно тому, как некоторые в детстве боготворят героев, один юноша обожал силы, скрывающиеся в тени. Скрыв свою силу и прожив посредственную жизнь посредственного персонажа, проходя в это время через безумные ночные тренировки, он в конце концов перерождается в ином мире, обретая абсолютную силу. Юноша, отыгрывающий роль скрывающейся в тени силы, его неправильно всё понимающие подчинённые и огромная стёртая в пыль теневая организация… Это история о юноше, обожавшем скрывающиеся во мраке силы, который, вероятно, в итоге обретёт власть над теневой стороной иного мира.   
  
  
- [Japanese Light Novel (Bookwalker)](https://bookwalker.jp/series/179219/)  
- [Japanese Light Novel (Amazon.co.jp)](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/4047353027/)  
- [LN Vol. 1 Youtube Promo](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9pahhkIs4Ss),with Kentarou Kumagai (熊谷健太郎) voicing the MC (Cid Kagenou)
description.es-la: Tal cual como todos adoraban héroes en su niñez, cierto adolescente adoraba los poderes que se esconden en las sombras. Tras haber ocultado su fuerza y viviendo la vida mediocre de un mob durante el día y entrenando descontroladamente por la noche, él finalmente reencarna en un mundo diferente y gana el poder definitivo. El adolescente que solo juega a ser una eminencia en las sombras, sus subordinados confusos, y una gigante organización en las sombras que es pisoteada... Esta es la historia de un adolescente que adoraba esos poderes en las sombras y que posiblemente llegue a reinar en las sombras de otro mundo.

title.en: I Don't Feel Like Doing Anything

altTitles.en: I Don't Want To Do Anything
Summer Strike

description.en:
One spring day, after the recent death of her mother, Summer decides to quit her stressful city job. She moves to a small beachside town, where she plans to use her entire life savings on two years of doing absolutely nothing. She calculates that she can subsist for this long without finding a job by leading a minimalist, free life. She finds peace and makes friends in her new environment But after a while, the walls of her home are repeatedly vandalized with death threats. Will Summer be able to catch the villain, find normalcy in her life, and make peace with herself?

---

description.ko:
26살의 봄, 오늘부터 아무것도 하지 않기로 결심했다

엄마가 그랬다. 
손해 보고 사는 게 편하다고.

엄마 말이 맞다.
그래, 손해 보고 살자.

단, 호구 잡히지 않을 정도만.

이여름, 26세 봄
오늘 회사를 그만뒀다.

altTitles.en: Strawberry Marshmallow

altTitles.ja: 苺ましまろ

altTitles.ja-ro: Ichigo Marshmallow

description.en: "Cute girls doing cute things in cute ways." Everyday things make up the fabric of life, whether it's making friends, going to school, trying to make money, or celebrating a holiday. Ichigo Mashimaro follows the antics and daily lives of Chika Itoh, her sister Nobue, and her friends Miu, Matsuri, and Ana.

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

altTitles.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

description.en:
No matter how hard things seem to be, there is always 'someone' watching over you.

A ghost who remained in this world with lingering attachments, one day encountered an office worker left exhausted from work, Nozaki.

"Nobody even looks at me..."

Nozaki was consumed with loneliness.
The ghost, who was all alone at the end of his own life, decided to watch over his daily life.

Though left at the mercy of his job, Nozaki desperately carried on each day.
Until one day, he encountered someone new.

The feelings he lost amid the restless day-to-day, through connecting with others, Nozaki will gradually take back.
description.ja:
どんなつらい時でも、見ていてくれる「誰か」がいる。

この世に未練を残してさまよっていた幽霊は、ある日、仕事に疲れた会社員、野崎と出会う。

「俺のことなんて、誰も見てないんだ…」

孤独感に打ちひしがれる野崎。人生の最後に一人ぼっちだった幽霊は、彼の生活を見守ってみることに。仕事に翻弄されながらも必死に日々を送る野崎。やがて彼に新たな出会いが訪れる。忙しない日々の中でこぼれ落ちてしまった気持ちを、野崎は人との関わりの中で、少しずつ取り戻していく――。

altTitles.en: I'm the Villainous Male Lead's Terminally Ill Aunt
I am the Terminally Ill Nanny of the Dark Male Lead.

altTitles.es-la: Soy la niñera por tiempo limitado del villano

altTitles.en: I Am the Nanny of the Villain

description.en:
She became the nanny of Claude, the blackened male protagonist who would destroy the world. If this continues, she will be killed by the cursed power possessed by the blackened male protagonist. So, she decided to pour out her love for the blackened male protagonist to prevent the blackening.

She also raised the child’s self-esteem, and made the Duke act like a proper father, as fatherly love was essential for the male protagonist’s self-esteem.

She thought the child was gradually recovering his bright face, and the Duke was now learning how to gradually give love to the child.

But she doesn’t know if it’s because she worked too hard….?

“It has always been a problem. You have hundreds of reasons to abandon me, but I don’t have a single one.”

“Nanny will always be by my side, right? That’s why you can’t go. Never, never.”

Two men started obsessing over me.

altTitles.ja: キングダム

altTitles.ja-ro: Kingudamu

description.en:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.uk: Мільйони років минуло з часів легенд, коли світ людей і богів був єдиним. У ті часи бажання людини верховодило над світом. Це була епоха 500-річної війни, період ворожих держав. «Королівство» — історія про хлопчину на ім’я Сінь, котрий прагне стати найвеличнішим генералом та про безліч випробувань та скитань, повз які пролягатиме його шлях до мети.
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

title.en: I Created a Harem by Accident!

altTitles.pt-br: Eu criei um harém por acidente

description.pt-br: Em um romance adulto hardcore cheio de vilões perversos e situações frustrantes, Selena Crawford é a protagonista feminina que sofre sem parar. Quando uma atriz anônima acorda como Selena, ela está determinada a usar sua inteligência e habilidades de atuação para ficar longe do protagonista masculino e mudar seu destino. Mas enquanto ela luta para fazer isso, parece que ainda mais possíveis interesses amorosos são atraídos por ela. Ela conseguirá evitar habilmente o protagonista masculino e expulsar os vilões? Ou ela simplesmente acabará em uma bagunça ainda maior?

The kind and popular Hajime lends her some clothes and she falls in love with him at first sight, after not being able to speak to him for a long time, she discovers a terrible truth about him but is undeterred into trying to win his heart.

title.en: Zense wa Kentei. Konjou Kuzu Ouji

altTitles.ja: 前世は剣帝。今生クズ王子

altTitles.ja-ro: Zense wa Kentei. Konjou Kuzu Ouji

altTitles.zh-hk: 前世是劍帝。今生是渣王子

altTitles.pt-br: Na Minha Vida Anterior Eu Era o Imperador da Espada. Nesta vida sou um Príncipe Lixo.

altTitles.en: Sword Emperor previous life, Prince Trash this life.
Previous Life was Sword Emperor. This Life is Trash Prince.

description.en:
He was called a Sword Emperor who lived for the sword and died by the sword. And his end was a tragedy. 

However, by strange coincidence, he was reincarnated as the third prince in a country. He was enjoying his lazy lifestyle away from swords and heroism. As a consequence, people began referring to him as Prince Trash.

He never cared about his derogatory name until one day, he encounters someone who gets the wheel of fate to move in motion.
description.ja: 世間に悪名轟く「クズ王子」ファイ。その前世は「剣帝」と呼ばれた男だった。頑なに剣から距離を置き、グータラ三昧の日々を過ごすファイだったが、隣国でのある出会いをきっかけに、運命の歯車が動き出す。
description.pt-br: A espada, vivia pela espada e morria pela espada. Depois de dias e meses de batalha, o espadachim escolheu a morte por sua própria vontade, mas renasceu como Fai Hanse Diestburg, o terceiro príncipe do reino de Diestburg. Querendo se distanciar de sua vida passada, onde vivia como possuído pela espada, Fai decidiu levar uma vida perdulária, ganhando o apelido de “Príncipe Lixo”. No entanto, um dia, devido a um trato com a casa real de Afillis, o reino vizinho, Fai é enviado para a guerra, liderando tropas de reforço. No campo de batalha, Fai testemunha uma cena de desespero quando o “Herói”, uma existência com poder rivalizando com dezenas de milhares, varre o campo de batalha. Fai considerou retornar ao reino, mas a morte de um certo cavaleiro conseguiu abalar seu coração, então ele decidiu empunhar a espada mais uma vez – a lenda do príncipe preguiçoso mais forte começa!

altTitles.en: Chained Soldier

altTitles.es: El esclavo de la élite de soldados de Mato

altTitles.en: Slave of the Hell Soldiers
Slave of the Magic Capital's Elite Troops

altTitles.ja: 魔都精兵のスレイブ

altTitles.vi: Nô lệ của đội tinh nhuệ Ma đô

description.en:
The demon-filled dimension known as "Mato" has opened to threaten humanity, and a type of "peach" tree that grows there yields fruit that confers special powers to those who eat it, giving humanity a fighting chance, but this only works for women. As such, as protectors of humanity, women rise in social status while men are relegated to second-class citizens scraping for basic occupation and acknowledgment.   
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, a domestically crafty and laborious high school senior whose older sister was taken during a Mato event 5 years before; while lamenting the hardships of the life ahead of him, an event opens before him, and while being rescued from demons by Captain Kyouka of the Anti-Demon Corps, she confers him powers as her "slave" and turns him into a mighty beast mount that mows down the demons.   
  
However, there is a surprising price to pay for being her "slave"… and it's not him who has to pay it.
description.fr:
La dimension démoniaque connue sous le nom de "Mato" s'est ouverte pour menacer l'humanité, et une sorte de "pêcher" qui y pousse donne des fruits qui confèrent des pouvoirs spéciaux à ceux qui les mangent, donnant à l'humanité une chance de se battre, mais cela ne fonctionne que pour les femmes. Ainsi, en tant que protectrices de l'humanité, les femmes gagnent en statut social tandis que les hommes sont relégués à des citoyens de seconde zone qui se battent pour une occupation et une reconnaissance de base.  
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, une lycéenne rusée et laborieuse dont la sœur aînée a été enlevée lors d'un événement du Mato 5 ans auparavant ; alors qu'elle se lamente sur les difficultés de la vie qui l'attend, un événement s'ouvre devant elle, et alors qu'elle est sauvée des démons par le capitaine Kyouka du Corps Anti-Démon, elle lui confère ses pouvoirs d'"esclave" et le transforme en un puissant monticule animal qui fauche les démons.  
  
Cependant, il y a un prix surprenant à payer pour être son "esclave"… et ce n'est pas lui qui doit le payer.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/takemura4hey/)
description.ru:
Эта боевая фентезийная манга повествует о нескольких героинях, что защищают людей в альтернативном пространстве, именуемом Мато (Город Демонов).  


---
description.vi:
Chiều không gian đầy quỷ dữ được gọi là "Ma đô" đã mở ra đe dọa đối với loài người. Tại đó, có một loài  "đào" ban cho kẻ ăn sức mạnh đặc biệt, giúp nhân loại có cơ hội chiến đấu, tuy nhiên, chỉ có nữ giới mới có thể sử dụng thứ sức mạnh "trái đào" ấy. Bởi vậy mà phụ nữ trở thành những người bảo vệ loài người, địa vị xã hội tăng cao, trong khi nam giới bị giáng xuống tầng lớp công dân hạng hai, giành giật nhau những công việc cơ bản và sự thừa nhận.

Nhân vật chính Yuuki Wakura, một nam sinh chăm chỉ yêu nội trợ, chị gái cậu đã bị bắt trong một sự kiện của Ma đô 5 năm về trước. Khi đang than thở về những khó khăn gặp phải, cậu đã bị lũ quỷ tấn công. Nhờ được đội trưởng Kyouka của Đội chống Quỷ kịp thời ứng cứu, cậu chấp nhận trở thành "nô lệ" của cô để có thể sở hữu sức mạnh tiêu diệt bầy quỷ.

Bất ngờ thay, việc làm "nô lệ" đòi hỏi một cái giá tương xứng...và người phải trả giá lại không phải là cậu.
description.pt-br:
A dimensão cheia de demônios conhecida como "Mato" se abriu para ameaçar a humanidade, e uma espécie de "pessegueiro" que ali cresce produz frutos que conferem poderes especiais a quem os come, dando à humanidade uma chance de lutar, mas isso só funciona para mulheres. Como tal, como protetoras da humanidade, as mulheres ascendem no estatuto social, enquanto os homens são relegados a cidadãos de segunda classe, em busca de uma ocupação básica e de reconhecimento.

 Yuuki Wakura é um estudante do último ano do ensino médio, astuto e trabalhoso, cuja irmã mais velha foi raptada durante um evento em Mato, 5 anos antes; enquanto lamenta as dificuldades da vida que tem pela frente, um evento se abre diante dele, e ao ser resgatado dos demônios pela Capitã Kyouka do Corpo Anti-Demônio, ela confere a ele poderes como seu "escravo" e o transforma em uma poderosa montaria bestial. que destrói os demônios.

No entanto, há um preço surpreendente a pagar por ele ser seu “escravo”… e não é ele quem tem que pagar.

altTitles.ja: 失敗作の使い魔と魔術師の話

altTitles.en: A Failure of a Familiar and a Mage

description.en: A mage adopts an abandoned familiar. After 80 years of raising her and trying to teach her magic and emotion, he passes away, and she embarks on a journey to help other abandoned familiars and tour the spots that remind her of her late master.
description.pt-br: Um Oneshot sobre o relacionamento de um mago e uma familiar abandonada, o que esperar dessa história?!

title.en: Isekai de Tochi o Katte Noujou o Tsukurou

altTitles.ja: 異世界で土地を買って農場を作ろう

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai de Tochi wo Katte Noujou wo Tsukurou

altTitles.en: Let’s Buy the Land and Cultivate It in a Different World

description.en:
Corporate drone Itonami Norio is summoned to another world and granted a powerful skill, [Supreme Wielder], which is invisible to those who summoned him. They’re dismayed to see he’s useless to them, so he asks only for a little plot of land to work for himself.

His skill allows him to use any tool to its greatest abilities, including fishing poles, cooking utensils, and construction tools. When he fishes up a mermaid who wants him for her bridegroom, charms a young dragon with his cooking, and excites an undead king with his rare skill, how long can his quiet country life last?!
